game.name: BULT: Hunting simulator
game.categories: Single-player, In-App Purchases, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Realistic waterfowl hunting simulator. Calls, decoys, a boat, and your hunting skills — everything you need to track down your prey in open hunting grounds. Feel the thrill of real hunting without leaving your home.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Realistic waterfowl hunting simulator. Calls, decoys, a boat, and your hunting skills — everything you need to track down your prey in open hunting grounds. Feel the thrill of real hunting without leaving your home.
